content.body: Whatâ€™s the expectation for presenting a proposal a second time? Is it presenting the delta/changes between the last presentation or is it more like presenting for the first time?
I always include a quick recap of the proposal. There are lots of proposals, and not everyone can make every meeting, or there could be new attendees. So I think it's nice to give some context.
Though naturally don't eat up so much of the timebox that there isn't time to actually talk about the new parts
